manageTutorialGroups.title: Tutorial Groups Management
manageTutorialGroups.tableCaption: Tutorial Groups defined for this course

deleteButton.question: Are you sure to delete the Tutorial Group with title {{ title }}?
deleteButton.typeNameToConfirm: Please enter the title of the tutorial group to confirm.

titleInput.label: Title
titleInput.maxLengthValidationError: Title can be max 255 characters long!

teachingAssistantInput.label: Teaching Assistant
teachingAssistantInput.placeholder: Select a teaching assistant that will be responsible for this group.
teachingAssistantInput.notFoundText: No teaching assistants found in this course.
teachingAssistantInput.requiredValidationError: A tutorial groups needs a teaching assistant assigned!
teachingAssistantInput.taHelp: You can search for a teaching assistant by typing into the field.

additionalInformationInput.label: Additional Information
additionalInformationInput.placeholder: Additional information about the tutorial group.
additionalInformationInput.maxLengthValidationError: Additional information is limited to 2000 characters!

locationInput.placeholderOnline: How can the students join the online meeting?
locationInput.placeholderOffline: How can the students find the room?

isOnlineInput.label: Does this tutorial group meet online? (Online-Tutorial)

weekDay.label: Weekday on which the tutorial group meets

timeZoneInput.label: Time Zone
timeZoneInput.requiredValidationError: A time zone needs to be selected!
timeZoneInput.tzHelp: You can search for a time zone by typing into the field.

periodInput.label: Period in which the tutorial group meets:
